title: Junction rule - unknown current in circuit

content.question: What are the value and the direction of the current through Resistor <math alttext="R sub 1" overflow="scroll"> <msub> <mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi> <mn>1</mn> </msub> </math> in the circuit shown?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.0 amp" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> toward the top of the page
<math alttext="1.0 amp" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> toward the bottom of the page
<math alttext="2.0 amps" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> toward the top of the page
<math alttext="2.0 amps" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> toward the bottom of the page

content.answer: <math alttext="1.0 amp" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> toward the bottom of the page
